column5: Had the opportunity to fish Lake Scugog on Friday with the legendary JohnnyBass. Now with a name like JonnyBass I'm thinking he must know a thing or two about bass fishing, Well it wasn't long before he lived up to his name....       Oh no the WGSF! Is the legendary JonnyBass destined for a day of fighting rockbass...    I don't think so...      It was a good day...30 plus bass a small muskie and several muskie follows.
Great report and pics!!!  Some real noice Largies there!
Sounds like a great day out. Good job.
Nice job guys, good to see the bog treating someone right today!

Hey you forgot about the pickerel you caught that was camera shy.lol And the fact that the weather forecast called for 20mm of rain and it rained close to zip!!!!! And the musky we seen in the shallows. Also the 2 you lost and the one follow I had!!!!  It was great fishing with ya Jeff, Gotta do it again soon!
Great job guys, looks like you had a great day with lots of action.  Thanks for posting.

Yes...two lessons were learned...pickeral are very slippery and never listen to the Weather Network! There was that one point in the afterenoon were the musky seemed to tun on. The boat beside us nailed one, then Johnny had a follow and then I had one try to smash my spinner bait beside the boat...all within like half an hour.
Yes a good day indeed, WTG...
